name: Escape the Creep v0.5 - Unreal Challenge
name_original: Escape the Creep v0.5 - Unreal Challenge
description:
Escape the Creep - Unreal Challenge themed "Creep it Real".

My entry on the challenge: https://forums.unrealengine.com/t/escape-the-creep/679867

Heavily inspired by art piece Escape by Alena Aenami https://www.artstation.com/artwork/r9lEY2 

Music is done by Severi Boesen https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHVX5UvZ98FMyIB_1Sd8iLw

This is version 0.5, as it doesn't actually have the creep yet functioning in large scale environment.

Interact by pressing E

Feel free to give feedback about:

  • the mood of the game
  • the songs
  • the controls of the motorcycle
